<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Risk status and Decision status field values are updated based on state fields.</description>
        <name>Updating Risk and DecisionStatus fields </name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[updateStatusField('risk', 'risk_state');
updateStatusField('dmn_decision', 'decision_state');

function updateStatusField(tableName, fieldName) {

	gs.log('Updating '+ fieldName+ 'field on '+ tableName +' table Fix Script STARETED AT - ' + new GlideDateTime().getDisplayValue());

    var mUpdate = new GlideMultipleUpdate(tableName);
    mUpdate.addQuery('state', 'pending');
    mUpdate.setValue(fieldName, '-5');
    mUpdate.execute();

    mUpdate = new GlideMultipleUpdate(tableName);
    mUpdate.addQuery('state', 'achieved');
    mUpdate.setValue(fieldName, '3');
    mUpdate.execute();

    mUpdate = new GlideMultipleUpdate(tableName);
    mUpdate.addQuery('state', 'not_achieved');
    mUpdate.setValue(fieldName, '4');
    mUpdate.execute();
	
	gs.log('Updating '+ fieldName+ 'field on '+ tableName +' table Fix Script ENDED AT - ' + new GlideDateTime().getDisplayValue());
}]]></script>
